name: 休闲拼一拼
description:
Introduction to the game


This is a relatively simple jigsaw puzzle. Each picture has a ranking record. You can constantly challenge yourself. There is no fastest, only faster!

game features


Each picture is in a dynamic state. Although there is no big action, it can also distinguish between static pictures and inflexibility.

Each picture has different leisure themes and complexity, challenging yourself in simplicity.
